title: Stabilisation of solid-state cubic ammonia confined in a glass substance at ambient temperature under atmospheric pressure
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,16128-16137
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00229F, Paper

Masao Morishita, Hayate Miyoshi, Haruto Kawasaki, Hidefumi Yanagita
Ammonia exhibits structural transitions depending on T and p, offering valuable insights into planetary science. Cubic crystal ammonia was stabilized at ambient T under atmospheric p for the first time, being a candidate of hydrogen storage medium.
